name.ja: アロマリリス－ロザリーナ

text.en: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 "Aroma" monster you control; gain LP equal to half its ATK. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 non-Tuner "Aroma" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Plant monsters. You can only use each effect of "Aromalylith Rosalina" once per turn.
